title: ACCOUTNS BEING BANNED AND HACKED WITHOUT RECGNITION
body:
SO BACK LAST SEASON I HAD 2 ACCOUNTS GET BANNED FOR PLAYING AT A INTERNET CAFE IN AUSTRALIA THAT GOT LISTED AS A 3RD PARTY PROGRAM WHICH WERE INFACT  FALSE 
PROOF OF ROGUE SCRIPT LISTENING ALSO ACCOUNTS THAT WERE BANNED
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=flnalhour
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=deftsuu
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/6joARgs0-perma-banned-for-using-3rd-party-software
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/rUd7nuIA-permabanned-incorrectly-for-3rd-party-software
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4slist/got_banned_for_a_hacking_or_thirdparty/
AS LISTED HERE WHEN I TOLD THE RIOT WORKER THAT I NEVER USED A SCRIPT AND SWORE BY IT HE REPLIED TO ME STATING THAT I DID WHICH WAS FALSE  IF THESE WERE COUNTED AS A 3RD PARTY PROGRAM ( SKYPE CURSE DISCORD) THEN IT MUST BE A MISTAKE BUT WHEN IT HAPPEN I KNEW I COULDNT DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT SINCE THE RIOT WORKERS WERE SO DUMBSMACKED THEY DIDNT LET IN 
AFTER THIS HAPPEN I STILL HAD ONE MORE ACCOUNT (IAMPAULIE) 
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=IamPaulie
WHICH WEREE ALL LINKED TO SAME EMAILS AT THE TIME
(IF A RIOT MEMBER MESSAGES ME WILL PROVIDE THEM TO THEM)
NOW PAULIE RECENTLY GOT HACKED 
AND WHEN I WENT TO DO THE RECOVERY FOR THE ACCOUNT THE TEAM WAS SO POOR ABOUT MY INFOMATION (WHICH WAS INFACT MUCH MORE HIGHER GRADED THEN THE INFO THEY ASKED FOR WHICH WAS INFACT THEIR) THEY STILL TURNED AROUND AND SAID NO AT THIS POINT IM REALLY GETTING TO BOILING POINT BECAUSE I HAVE DONE NOTHING WRONG BUT PLAY THE GAME WITH FRIENDS BUY SKINS WITH MY OWN MONEY I WORKED FOR AND I PRETTY MUCH GOT THE FLICK FOR IT 
I SEEK VENGENCE IN ANYWAY AGAINST THE RIOT TEAM BECAUSE IVE HAD ENOUGH.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're unable to provide the information that Player Support requires to process an Account Recovery, then unfortunately there is no way for you to recover your account.

Please continue to follow up with Player Support about this matter if you feel you have further information that could aid in the recovery of your account, the information they request is just a guideline, any information you can provide that isn't publically accessible about the account will be helpful in the recovery process.

I had your Deftsuu account in ranked once on another account (I believe in Season 5,  so a far while ago..), you undoubtedly were scripting... lol

I'm surprised it took so long for you to get banned, that's more what needs to be all caps raged about.
is this some type of troll to make sure the account doesn't get returned?
in what way was i scripting i only played vayne and was considered decent with the champion you must have some mistake.
